DOC.detailed_description: The overarch objective project conduct randomize trial evaluate effectiveness Individual Well-Being Navigator ( Iwin ) mobile application , substance abuse prevention well-being enhancement program design specifically military personnel . Military personnel recruit ask complete series screen question personal mobile device . An estimated 1624 Personnel need screen arrive eligible sample 812 . Randomization eligible sample occur within online baseline assessment individual level soon participant completes Informed Consent form . Those randomized Control Group ( n=406 ) complete assessment baseline , 6 month , 9 month . Those randomized Intervention Group ( n=406 ) complete schedule assessment control group addition access Iwin application ( app ) baseline 6 month assessment . The assessment include variety question health , wellness , substance use well-being . Personnel randomize treatment group able download Iwin app free onto personal device . The Pro‐Change Iwin application build use IMS Health AppNucleus™ Platform . AppNucleus patent , federally certify ( FIPS 140‐2 , DIACAP MAC II Sensitive ) , secure application platform enable Pro‐Change rapidly deploy secure mHealth solution user via web portal commercial mobile technology ( iOS , Android , Windows Phone , Blackberry ) . The application provide innovative , tailored program use best practice behavior change science innovative technology assist military personnel prevent substance abuse enhance well‐being provide appropriate intervention content right time individual need . It deliver assessment tailor feedback immediately eleven different risk behavior well mobile interactive stag matched activity , engage game‐like feature in‐app notification behavior risk course 6 month . The app provide reminder users return program set time point . Both treatment control participant receive e-mail reminder complete follow-up assessment 6 9 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . English speak 2 . Between 18 65 year age 3 . Currently serve US Military approve branch 4 . Have access mobile device Internet connectivity 5. email account check least weekly 6 . Comfortable use application mobile device 7 . Have meet criterion binge drinking within previous year 8 . Not currently effectively manage stress . 1. history mania , schizophrenia , psychoses ; 2. special medical condition may prevent engagement mobile application , history significant head injury ; 3. suicidal ideation 4. score > 19 PHQ8 ( indication severe major depression ) ; 5. severe PTSD symptom ( PCLM score > 43 ) . 6 . Currently Pregnant
